channel.title: oracle on Bonjour!
channel.description: Recent content in oracle on Bonjour!

item.title: Oracle Jdbc Url
item.description: JDBC URL syntax jdbc:oracle:thin:@[HOST][:PORT]:SID jdbc:oracle:thin:@//[HOST][:PORT]/SERVICE Hikari Pool를 사용 시 아래와 같이 경고메시지가 나타나면 oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver에서 oracle.jdbc.OracleDriver 로 바꿀 것 2015-09-10 WARN (main) [DriverDataSource(<init>:68)] Registered driver with driverClassName=oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver was not found, trying direct instantiation. 2015-09-10 DEBUG (main) [PoolUtilities(getAndSetNetworkTimeout:198)] HikariPool-0 - Connection.setNetworkTimeout() not supported JDBC - Oracle FAQ Database JDBC Developer’s Guide and Reference
